title: Veterinary Journal of Clinical Practice
authors: Patrick Hudson Fernando White Jasmine Wang Richard Bonilla Timothy Brown
affiliation: California State Polytechnic University-Pomona, School of Economics
text:
Physician: “But is there any gene involved?”

Patient: “No, there is none.”

Physician: “What then?”

Patient: “It feels like fresh blood everywhere. I feel like I’m in a pool.”
